name: Enchanted Sapling
text:
When Enchanted Sapling enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Enchanted Sapling.

name: Ember Sprite
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Ember Sprite enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target. If that target is a creature, Ember Sprite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: A spark in the night, a flicker of rage.

name: Faerie Protector
text: {W}: Another target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor: In the heart of the enchanted forest, even the smallest creatures can wield powerful protective magic.

name: Faerie Illusionist
text: Flying. {1}{U}, Tap: Create a token that's a copy of Faerie Illusionist. It gains 'When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.'
flavor: The more you see, the less you know.

name: Enchanted Grove

abilities.tap: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

abilities.tap, sacrifice Enchanted Grove: Search your library for a Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

flavor: The forest's magic nurtures all who tread its paths.

name: Faerie's Bargain
text: As an additional cost to cast Faerie's Bargain, sacrifice a creature. Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness instead of its power.
